Summary: Big ball of light falling from the sky Meteor or M
divs: Sighting DetailsWas driving south on Hwy 85 near just before Homestead SunnyvaleCupertino. Itwas about 530pm Thursday 11202003. There was a HUGE Bright Ball of mostly whiteLight falling from the sky, with a fat tail. This lasted for about 4-5 seconds. Many people called into KGO radio about. My friend who was also driving thesame route saw it as well. He lives in Loma Prieta and as seen the Lenoids lastyear and told me this really looked man made. It was HUGE Looked like it wasfalling onto the hills of Saratoga. I called around and the only info I wasable to get was from the San Jose Mercury News. They said it was a missile testby Edwards Airforce base. Although the in NOT confirmed. Im curious to find outif it was a missile test.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Sunnyvale
There were no other sightings in Sunnyvale on or around November 20th 2003
